Build ID: 20110622105328

Steps to reproduce:

installed fedora 15 and so firefox 5.0

and, installed kmod-nvidia following fedora-solved:

http://fedorasolved.org/video-solutions/nvidia-yum-kmod



Actual results:

when I scroll a web page it falls apart, the left part goes independently of the right part

and, the page appear inconsistent,  i.e. some elements does not display fully

It is not clear whether this is a firefox or a video driver problem


Expected results:

the page should display simply as a constant bitmapped image, not an image that falls apart upon scrolling
